item.title: How to Use Twilio for SMS
item.description: With CRM software being high in demand, there is always a need to keep in touch with the end user. Using Twilio, you can easily register new virtual phone numbers to send and recieve text messages and voice calls. Phone Number Registration First, obtain an account sid and auth token from the console. Imagine giving each user their own phone number. Phone number registration is simple and only costs $1 a month.
